ValidationRule.description: Pre Implementation Stage, Post Implementation Stage, BackOut Stage check box fields can't modify after SOE creation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISCHANGED( Pre_Implementation_Stage__c ) , ISCHANGED( Post_Implementation_Stage__c ) , ISCHANGED( BackOut_Stage__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Pre Implementation Stage, Post Implementation Stage, BackOut Stage check box fields can't modify after SOE creation
